session_summary: Gina and Jon met at 4:04 pm on 20 January, 2023. Jon lost his job as a banker and planned to start a dance studio because of his passion for dancing. Gina also lost her job at Door Dash. They both shared a love for dance, with Jon's favorite style being contemporary. They planned to attend a dance class together. Jon showed Gina a photo of his dance crew winning a competition. Gina revealed her experience of winning first place with a contemporary piece in a dance competition. Jon mentioned rehearsing with a group for various dance styles and upcoming projects, including a performance at a festival. Gina complimented the group's grace and expressed excitement for their festival performance. They both shared enthusiasm for the upcoming events.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jon! Good to see you. What's up? Anything new?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Hey Gina! Good to see you too. Lost my job as a banker yesterday, so I'm gonna take a shot at starting my own business.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Sorry about your job Jon, but starting your own business sounds awesome! Unfortunately, I also lost my job at Door Dash this month. What business are you thinking of?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Sorry to hear that! I'm starting a dance studio 'cause I'm passionate about dancing and it'd be great to share it with others.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: That's cool, Jon! What got you into this biz?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: I've been into dancing since I was a kid and it's been my passion and escape. I wanna start a dance studio so I can teach others the joy that dancing brings me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Wow Jon, same here! Dance is pretty much my go-to for stress relief. Got any fave styles?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Cool, Gina! I love all dances, but contemporary is my top pick. It's so expressive and powerful! What's your fave?

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, me too! Contemporary dance is so expressive and graceful - it really speaks to me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Wow, great idea! Let's go to a dance class, it'll be so much fun!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Yeah! Let's explore some new dance moves. We should plan a dance session soon!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Yeah definitely! Wanna see my moves next Fri? Can't wait!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great, Jon! Next Friday works. Let's boogie!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a man in a suit is performing a dance
conversation_turns.query: dancing on stage performance dance competition last year
conversation_turns.text: Wow, I'm excited too! This is gonna be great!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Wow! What did you get?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Woah, that pic's from when my dance crew took home first in a local comp last year. It was amazing up on that stage! I'm super keen to spread that intensity with other peeps. Gina, you ever been in any dance comps or shows?

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a couple of people standing next to each other
conversation_turns.text: I used to compete in a few dance competitions and shows - my fav memory was when my team won first place at a regionals at age fifteen. It was an awesome feeling of accomplishment!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Wow! Winning first place is amazing! What dance were you doing?

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a large open porch with a fireplace and a view of the water
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! We just did a contemporary piece called "Finding Freedom." It was really emotional and powerful.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a room with a view of the ocean and a few yoga mats
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that must've been great! Check my ideal dance studio by the water.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Cool setup! Man, you can't deny that view! Got time to rehearse with a biz and a new store?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Hopefully, we will find a place like this that will inspire us!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Wow, it looks great! What dances do you practice? Got any projects planned?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of dancers in white dresses on a stage
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! I rehearsed with a small group of dancers after work. We do all kinds of dances, from contemporary to hip-hop. We've got some cool projects in the works. Finishing up choreography to perform at a nearby festival next month. Can't wait!

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Wow, it looks awesome! Are they yours at the festival? They're so graceful!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, they're the ones performing at the festival! They've been practicing hard and will definitely impress with their grace and skill.

conversation_turns.speaker: Gina
conversation_turns.text: Wow, they look great! Can't wait to see them rock the festival. Gonna be awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jon
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, awesome! Glad to be part of it.

Jon: Jon loses his job as a banker.
Jon begins planning for his own business venture.
Gina: Gina loses her job at Door Dash.
Gina lost her job at Door Dash during the month of the conversation.
Gina used to compete in dance competitions and shows, winning first place in a regional competition at the age of fifteen.
Gina's favorite dance style is contemporary.
Jon: Jon lost his job as a banker the day before the conversation.
Jon is starting his own dance studio due to his passion for dancing.
Jon's favorite dance style is contemporary.
Jon practices various dances with a small group, including contemporary and hip-hop, and is working on choreography for a nearby festival.
